name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence for Noel's Lyrical Live performance.
Transition into the performance stage, a stylized city street at night.
Performance of the song 'Katsute Tensai datta Ore-tachi e' (To Those of Us Who Used to Be Geniuses).

subtitles.original:
かつて天才だった俺たちへ
作詞：R-指定　作曲：DJ松永
subtitles.english:
To Those of Us Who Used to Be Geniuses
Lyrics: R-Shitei, Composer: DJ Matsunaga

subtitles.original: 泣いてたとか　怖いとか　気づかなければ
subtitles.english: If I hadn't realized I was crying or scared,

subtitles.original: 俺だって　ボルトと友達になれた
subtitles.english: Even I could have been friends with Bolt.

subtitles.original: 頭が悪いとか　思わなけりゃ
subtitles.english: If I hadn't thought I was stupid,

subtitles.original: きっとファインマン　ゼネフらと解けた
subtitles.english: I surely could have solved things with Feynman or Zenef.

subtitles.original: スベリ倒した　マサヤには　笑わなけりゃ
subtitles.english: If I hadn't laughed at Masaya who slipped,

subtitles.original: ずっと小松の茶に酔ってた
subtitles.english: I'd have been drunk on Komatsu's tea forever.

subtitles.original: 力が弱いとか　独裁とか　知らなきゃ
subtitles.english: If I didn't know about weakness or dictatorship,

subtitles.original: 俺が　地球を守ってた
subtitles.english: I would have been the one protecting the Earth.

subtitles.original: 背ぇ破り過ぎた　あの落書きや
subtitles.english: Those drawings I tore out because they were too much,

subtitles.original: 似合わないと言われた　髪型
subtitles.english: And the hairstyle I was told didn't suit me.

subtitles.original: うろ覚えの下手くそな　歌が
subtitles.english: My half-remembered, clumsy singing

subtitles.original: 世界を変えたかも
subtitles.english: Might have changed the world.

subtitles.original: かつて天才だった俺たちへ
subtitles.english: To us who were once geniuses,

subtitles.original: 神童だった貴方へ
subtitles.english: To you who were once a prodigy.

subtitles.original: 似たような形に整えられて
subtitles.english: Molded into similar shapes,

subtitles.original: 見る影も無い
subtitles.english: Not a trace of our former selves remains.

subtitles.original: いまだかつてないほど　入り組んだ way way way
subtitles.english: A path more convoluted than ever before, way way way

subtitles.original: 悩めるだけ悩み
subtitles.english: Worry as much as you need to,

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: And when the time comes, go for it!

subtitles.original: 風まかせ　どっちみち茨の way way way
subtitles.english: Let the wind take you; either way it's a thorny way way way

subtitles.original: 俺らは大器晩成
subtitles.english: We are late bloomers;

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: When the time comes, go for it!

subtitles.original: I wanna be a 勝者　I wanna be a 強者
subtitles.english: I wanna be a winner, I wanna be a powerhouse

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ高みへ　駆け込み乗車
subtitles.english: Hopping on the train to heights yet unseen

subtitles.original: 花火のような　運命だろうが
subtitles.english: Even if it's a fate like fireworks,

subtitles.original: 我が身果てるまで　やりきれそいや　yeah
subtitles.english: I'll keep going until my body gives out, yeah!

subtitles.original: 生まれてこの方　一体幾つ
subtitles.english: Since I was born, just how many

subtitles.original: 不便を見過ごしてきたんだろうか
subtitles.english: Inconveniences have I overlooked until now?

subtitles.original: 墓場に入るまで　あと一体幾つ
subtitles.english: Until I enter the grave, just how many

subtitles.original: 可能性の芽を摘んでしまうのだろうか
subtitles.english: Seeds of possibility will I end up crushing?

subtitles.original: 一体幾つ　獣を解き放てるだろうか
subtitles.english: How many beasts can I unleash?

subtitles.original: 今はまだ　見にくいアヒルの子
subtitles.english: Right now, I'm still an ugly duckling.

subtitles.original: ほらどうぞ　鞭とご鞭撻を
subtitles.english: Go ahead, give me your whip and guidance.

subtitles.original: ほらまた　世間の洗礼を浴びるとこ
subtitles.english: Here I am again, about to be baptized by the public.

subtitles.original: 俺はキャンバス　かなり汚れちまったけれど
subtitles.english: I'm a canvas, quite stained now but

subtitles.original: ワンチャンス
subtitles.english: One chance,

subtitles.original: その余白はあるさ　ちゃっかり
subtitles.english: There's still some blank space, quite cleverly.

subtitles.original: 目当たり　胴当たり　この隔たりを　永久に
subtitles.english: Colliding head-on, torso-on, this gap, eternally.

subtitles.original: かつて天才だった俺たちへ
subtitles.english: To us who were once geniuses,

subtitles.original: 神童だった貴方へ
subtitles.english: To you who were once a prodigy.

subtitles.original: 何だってなれた　another way
subtitles.english: We could have been anything, another way,

subtitles.original: まだ諦めちゃいない
subtitles.english: I haven't given up yet.

subtitles.original: いまだかつてないほど　入り組んだ way way way
subtitles.english: A path more convoluted than ever before, way way way

subtitles.original: 悩めるだけ悩み
subtitles.english: Worry as much as you need to,

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: And when the time comes, go for it!

subtitles.original: 風まかせ　どっちみち茨の way way way
subtitles.english: Let the wind take you; either way it's a thorny way way way

subtitles.original: 俺らは大器晩成
subtitles.english: We are late bloomers;

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: When the time comes, go for it!

subtitles.original: I wanna be a 勝者　I wanna be a 強者
subtitles.english: I wanna be a winner, I wanna be a powerhouse

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ高みへ　駆け込み乗車
subtitles.english: Hopping on the train to heights yet unseen

subtitles.original: 花火のような　運命だろうが
subtitles.english: Even if it's a fate like fireworks,

subtitles.original: 我が身果てるまで　やりきれそいや　yeah
subtitles.english: I'll keep going until my body gives out, yeah!

subtitles.original: お前は今だに　広がり続ける銀河
subtitles.english: You are still an ever-expanding galaxy.

subtitles.original: 孫の代までずっと　フレッシュマン
subtitles.english: A freshman forever, even to your grandchildren's generation.

subtitles.original: 粗探しが得意な　お国柄
subtitles.english: In a country where finding faults is the national trait,

subtitles.original: しかとでかまそうぜ　金輪際
subtitles.english: Let's just ignore it and go for it from now on.

subtitles.original: 俺も今だに　広がり続ける銀河
subtitles.english: I am also still an ever-expanding galaxy.

subtitles.original: 今は亡き奴までずっと　フレッシュマン
subtitles.english: Even those who are gone are freshmen forever.

subtitles.original: くたばり損ねて　冥土からカムバック
subtitles.english: Failing to die and coming back from the underworld,

subtitles.original: 草葉の陰から　ゴーン・フィンガー
subtitles.english: A gone finger from behind the scenes.

subtitles.original: 無傷のままじゃいられない
subtitles.english: You can't stay unscathed.

subtitles.original: 変わり続けていく　多面体
subtitles.english: A polyhedron that keeps changing.

subtitles.original: その物差しじゃ　測れない
subtitles.english: You can't measure it with that ruler.

subtitles.original: 測らせる気も無い
subtitles.english: And I have no intention of letting you.

subtitles.original: かつて天才だった俺たちへ
subtitles.english: To us who were once geniuses,

subtitles.original: 神童だった貴方へ
subtitles.english: To you who were once a prodigy.

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ明日へ　羽ばたけ　いくぜ
subtitles.english: Fly towards a tomorrow yet unseen, here we go:

subtitles.original: one two three four five
subtitles.english: one two three four five

subtitles.original: いまだかつてないほど　入り組んだ way way way
subtitles.english: A path more convoluted than ever before, way way way

subtitles.original: 悩めるだけ悩み
subtitles.english: Worry as much as you need to,

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: And when the time comes, go for it!

subtitles.original: 風まかせ　どっちみち茨の way way way
subtitles.english: Let the wind take you; either way it's a thorny way way way

subtitles.original: 俺らは大器晩成
subtitles.english: We are late bloomers;

subtitles.original: 時が来たら　かませ
subtitles.english: When the time comes, go for it!
